message.name: ERR_USER_XRV_DUPLICATE_RECORD
message.locale: The User Name entered has already been assigned to another User. Please enter a different name.

message.name: ERR_USER_XRV_CONCERNROLE_SENSITIVITY
message.locale: This user cannot have a greater sensitivity value than you.

message.name: ERR_USER_XRV_OWNER_CASES_PRESENT
message.locale: This user is the owner of at least one case and therefore cannot be canceled. Please contact the user's supervisor.
This user is the owner of at least one case and therefore cannot be cancelled. Please contact the user's supervisor.

message.name: ERR_USER_XRV_SUPERVISOR_CASES_PRESENT
message.locale: This user is the supervisor of at least one case and therefore cannot be canceled.
This user is the supervisor of at least one case and therefore cannot be cancelled.

message.name: ERR_USER_XRV_RESERVED_TASKS_PRESENT
message.locale: This user has tasks reserved and therefore this user cannot be canceled.
This user has tasks reserved and therefore this user cannot be cancelled.

message.name: ERR_USER_DEFAULT_LOCALE_EMPTY
message.locale: 'User Default Locale' must be entered.
'User Default Locale' must be entered.

message.name: ERR_USER_XRV_ASSIGNED_TASKS_PRESENT
message.locale: This user has tasks assigned and therefore this user cannot be canceled.
This user has tasks assigned and therefore this user cannot be cancelled.

message.name: ERR_ENCRYPTION_FAILED
message.locale: The encryption of the password failed, it is either too long or your system is improperly configured.

message.name: INF_ALREADY_ENABLED
message.locale: This users account is already enabled.

message.name: INF_ALREADY_DISABLED
message.locale: This users account has already been disabled.

message.name: INF_ALREADY_ACTIVE
message.locale: This User is already active.

message.name: INF_USER_REACTIVATE
message.locale: This user's details have been reactivated, however this user's profile within the organization must be redefined.
This user's details have been reactivated, however this user's profile within the organisation must be redefined.

message.name: INF_CLOSEUSER_CLOSED
message.locale: This user's account has passed the specified end date and is therefore considered closed by the system. This user therefore has limited system privileges.

message.name: ERR_CLOSEUSER_NON_CLOSED
message.locale: This user is not closed so cannot be reopened.

message.name: ERR_CLOSEUSER_CANCELLED_REOPEN
message.locale: This user is cancelled so cannot be reopened.

message.name: ERR_CLOSEUSER_CLOSED_DELETED
message.locale: The user is already closed and cannot be deleted.

message.name: ERR_USER_FV_UPPERUSER_NAME_EXCEEDED_LIMIT
message.locale: The limit on User Name has been exceeded by %1n character(s).

message.name: ERR_CHANGESET_APPLY_FAILED_PARTICIPANT_NOT_PRESENT
message.locale: The change set cannot be applied as linked participant is not present for an external user.
